page.title: 16FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Young{families}are usually small with only two or three children. Some houses are occupied by retired folk whose children visit them with grand- children. Most people have busy home lives, their time taken up with a variety activities.{Gardening}is very popular and people go to great lengths to ensure that flower beds are tidy and colourful. Home-grown vegetables reduce the cost of living, and some of the best are proudly displayed in the annual{Rhydycroesau}show which takes place in September. Visits to the nearby town of{Oswestry}form an important part of life, especially on Wednesday which is market day. Older people use the weekly{bus service. Nearly all of the families have dogs and a few people breed chickens and sell eggs.
